trans-unit.source: Represents the exception thrown when an event provider publishes invalid data in an event.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件提供者在事件中發行無效的資料時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The error message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述目前例外狀況的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException" /> class by specifying the error message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 藉由指定描述目前例外狀況的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that holds the serialized object data about the exception thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件，存放關於擲回之例外狀況的序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 物件，包含關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The error message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述目前例外狀況的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The Exception instance that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的 Exception 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException" /> class with an error message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用錯誤訊息和內部例外狀況，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogInvalidDataException" /> 類別的新執行個體。
